name: Greedy Truck.io
description:
The greedy truck.io moves gradually but you can use rapidity up button accelerator feature to move quickly. Slide truck is also problematic to turn and movement. If your greedy trucker.io is small then you take to traffic wisely as the bigger slide trucks are to come for the chance to trick and extinguish you in this 3d io game glide truck 3d 


Greedy Truck.io Features
• Challenging Trucker.io tricky levels.
• Truck io games for kids with Realistic HD graphics and engaging sound effects.
• Collect as much trailer.io trucks as possible to grow longer
• Play against AI & be the longest slither 3D truck.io game
• No performance issues, you can control the slithering truck easily
• Smooth gameplay with mobile controls with joystick
• No advertisement push. You may Remove Ads, if you want
• Try to beat your highest score based on your io game truck.io trucker length
